Title: Toggle Switch Control Library
Description: Use the Toggle Switch Control Library to create highly customizable toggle switch controls in Silverlight and WPF applications.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Use the Toggle Switch Control Library to create highly customizable toggle switch controls in Silverlight and WPF applications.

Available on Nuget: http://nuget.org/List/Packages/ToggleSwitch

Also available on GitHub: https://github.com/ejensen/toggle-switch-control



Requires Silverlight 4 or WPF 4 Client Profile
